list.abstract: 《player》（플레이어）是由高在贤执导，申载亨、Tony Jordan担任编剧，宋承宪、郑秀晶、李时言等主演的犯罪电视剧，于2018年9月29日在韩国OCN电视台播出。 该剧将讲述天才骗子、顶尖黑客、天赋车手以及炸裂打手等在各个领域有着非凡本事的人集结在一起的复仇故事。
player的五种含义：误入半条命服务器的反恐精英玩家；玩家；影音播放器；英文释义：“选手”、“演员”；英文俚语中的花心大萝卜。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you be a player/owner?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会当老板球员吗？
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Beijing is an important player on the global stage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 北京是国际舞台上一个重要的选手。

yingyinNormal.en: There's never been a player/owner, but maybe. Maybe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从来就没有老板球员这种人，不会额可能会吧，有可能。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: So, what do you do? Mostly player analysis right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你都干些什么？目前主要做球员分析。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a music player. It's a thousand songs in your pocket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一款音乐播放器，上千首的歌就装在你的口袋里。

yingyinNormal.en: And I just want you guys to know he was a beautiful player.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只想让你们知道，他是一个动人出色的乐手。

yingyinNormal.en: The piano doesn't murder the player if it doesn't like the music.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要是钢琴不喜欢弹奏的音乐，它是不会杀了弹钢琴的人的。

yingyinNormal.en: A one-year contract means the same thing to a manager as to a player.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一年的合同没法干，对于教练和球员来说都一样。

yingyinNormal.en: The sending off, because I flicked out at one player. Diego Simeone Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我被红牌罚出场，因为绊倒了一名球员，迭戈·西蒙尼。是的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: You know, Jim used to say the OASIS was never supposed to be a one-player game.
yingyinNormal.zh: 吉姆曾说，绿洲不应该是单人游戏。

yingyinNormal.en: You must be the youngest Quidditch player in a century, according to McGonagall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你一定是最年轻的球员，是百年最年轻的，麦格教授说的。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon Cooper is nothing if not a team player. Dr. Hofstadter, you have the conn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿·库珀如果不团队协作也一事无成，霍夫斯塔德博士，一切由你指挥。

yingyinNormal.en: Dad, come on, practice is over. Not till the last player leaves the gym. Team rule.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，练习时间结束了。最后一名队员下场才算，队里的规定。

yingyinNormal.en: A player makes a bunch of shots in a row. People are sure they're gonna make the next one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 运动员连续投球命中，人们确信他们会投中下一个。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, it does! The star player has just arrived. No way! Someone else. Please! Anyone else.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那可不，明星选手驾到。门都没有，拜托换别人，谁都好。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, a decade ago, I founded a small nonprofit and I built it into a major global player.
yingyinNormal.zh: 十年前，我成立了个小慈善组织，后来影响力逐渐强大。

yingyinNormal.en: He was a hard player, my dad. He always used to say to me, "I'll let you know when you've made it."
yingyinNormal.zh: 我爸是个强悍的球员，他过去常跟我说"等你踢出名堂，我会告诉你的"。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: But in a way I'm glad it happened cos it made me as a player, made me as a person, made me stronger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很欣慰发生了这一切，让我成为一名真正的球员，一个真正的人，让我更坚强。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: And they took over the responsibility of, you know, bringing me up as a football player but also a man.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后他们尽心尽责地将我培养成一个优秀的足球运动员，一个真正的男人。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: When I really looked at everything, everything a basketball player Could do for himself individually And for a team, Jeremy Lin was the best player here, But yet colleges weren't clamoring for him. He just didn't fit the mold.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我纵观这一切，一个篮球运动员能够为他自己，为球队做的一切，林书豪都是这里最好的球员，可是大学并没有争着要他，他不符合固有的模式

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Did you hear that the Chinese skiing <highlight>player</highlight>, Gu Ailing, won the first prize?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你听说中国滑雪运动员谷爱玲获得一等奖了吗？

examination_example.sentence: A lot of fans were attracted by the 13-year-old one-armed basketball <highlight>player</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多球迷都被这个13岁的独臂篮球运动员吸引住了。

examination_example.sentence: David is a tennis <highlight>player</highlight>,He began to play tennis when he was six years o1d.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大卫是一名网球运动员，他从六岁开始打网球。

examination_example.sentence: Can I bring my music <highlight>player</highlight> to school?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我能把我的音乐播放器带到学校吗？

examination_example.sentence: How long has Li Hua had the MP4 <highlight>player</highlight>?
Li Hua: I have an MP4 <highlight>player</highlight>.
Nowadays, there are fewer than one thousand well-trained guqin <highlight>players</highlight> and perhaps no more than fifty living masters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，训练有素的古琴手不到一千人，活着的大师也许不超过五十人。

examination_example.sentence: At that time, balalaikas were made by the <highlight>players</highlight> themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当时，巴拉莱卡是由球员自己制作的。
